title: Prepare for an Eviction Hearing
description: A PM has filed for eviction against a tenant for non-payment of rent and must prepare the file for the court hearing.

tasks.description: Gather all relevant documents: the signed lease, the full tenant ledger showing non-payment, and copies of all notices sent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete package of all evidence.

tasks.description: Create a chronological summary of events, from the first missed payment to the filing of the eviction.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, dated timeline of all events is created.

tasks.description: Send the complete document package and summary to the company's attorney.
tasks.expected_outcome: The organized file is securely sent to the legal counsel preparing for the hearing.
